summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5674 for the improvement of Valentine Place, from Atlantic Street to Massachusetts Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 75085, as amended by Ordinance No. 75313, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
